Others: The Cavaliers went 0-4 in their preseason schedule.
Donovan Mitchell had 22 points, Darius Garland had 23, Jarrett Allen had 25 points and 16 rebounds, and Evan Mobley had 15 points, 10 rebounds, and 8 assists.
Dean Wade contributed 14 points in the game.
The Cavaliers will start the season without Max Strus, who will be sidelined for at least six weeks due to an ankle injury.
